mapper.update: UPDATE cb_merchant_user SET is_delete = true AND id = #{id}

UPDATE cb_merchant_user
client_id = #{clientId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
outlet_id = #{outletId},
merchant_role_id = #{merchantRoleId},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
email = #{email},
phone = #{phone},
is_rest = #{isRest},
realname = #{realname},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.create_time, u.client_id, u.merchant_id, u.outlet_id , u.merchant_role_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.phone , u.is_rest, u.is_delete, u.realname , m.merchant_name , m.is_enable merchant_is_enable , m.disable_status merchant_disable_status , m.org_code , o.outlet_name FROM cb_merchant_user u LEFT JOIN cb_merchant m ON u.merchant_id = m.merchant_id LEFT JOIN cb_outlet o ON o.outlet_id = u.outlet_id WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.id, u.create_time, u.client_id, u.merchant_id, u.outlet_id , u.merchant_role_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.phone , u.is_rest, u.is_delete, u.realname , m.merchant_name , m.is_enable merchant_is_enable , m.disable_status merchant_disable_status , m.org_code , o.outlet_name FROM cb_merchant_user u LEFT JOIN cb_merchant m ON u.merchant_id = m.merchant_id LEFT JOIN cb_outlet o ON o.outlet_id = u.outlet_id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.client_id = #{clientId} limit 1

SELECT u.id, u.create_time, u.client_id, u.merchant_id, u.outlet_id , u.merchant_role_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.phone , u.is_rest, u.is_delete, u.realname ,(select m.merchant_name from cb_merchant m where m.merchant_id = u.merchant_id) merchant_name , m.merchant_name , m.is_enable merchant_is_enable , m.disable_status merchant_disable_status , m.org_code , o.outlet_name FROM cb_merchant_user u LEFT JOIN cb_merchant m ON u.merchant_id = m.merchant_id LEFT JOIN cb_outlet o ON o.outlet_id = u.outlet_id WHERE u.phone = #{phone} limit 1
